rules.natural: If a company develops a drug, then the drug undergoes clinical trials.
Provided that a company develops a drug, the drug is approved.
In the event that a researcher finds a plant safe, then if the plant is studied, the plant is not toxic.
Given that a researcher is a lead researcher, the researcher is respected.
A researcher is a lead researcher or a junior researcher.
Should a researcher be a junior researcher, then if the researcher finds a plant toxic, then provided the plant is studied, the plant is not toxic.
If a researcher is respected, then the researcher publishes.
Whenever a company is synthetic successful, the company uses synthetic methods.
A company is synthetic successful or natural successful.
In cases where a company is natural successful, a plant is effective.
If a plant is effective, then the plant is patented.
Given that a plant is patented, the company uses natural methods.
Should an agency provide FDA oversight, then if a drug undergoes clinical trials, the drug is not approved.
In the event that a reviewer is a senior reviewer, then if a researcher is a lead researcher, the researcher publishes.
Provided that a reviewer is a junior reviewer, then if a researcher is a lead researcher, the researcher publishes.
An editor assigns a senior reviewer or an editor assigns a junior reviewer.
Whenever an editor assigns a junior reviewer, the reviewer is a junior reviewer.
Assuming a researcher documents toxicity of a plant, then if the plant is studied, the plant is not toxic.
Given that a researcher receives a retraction, the researcher is under investigation.
In cases where a researcher receives a retraction, it is not the case that the researcher is discredited.
Provided that a researcher is under investigation, the researcher is discredited.
If a company uses synthetic methods, then if it is not the case that if the company develops a drug then the drug is not approved, then the drug is not profitable.
Should a company use natural methods, then if it is not the case that if the company develops a drug then the drug is not approved, then the drug is not profitable.
A researcher finds a plant toxic or finds a plant safe.
If it is not the case that if the company develops a drug then the drug is not approved, then the drug is profitable.
Should it not be the case that if an editor assigns a senior reviewer then the reviewer is a senior reviewer, then the reviewer has a conflict of interest.
In cases where it is not the case that if an editor assigns a senior reviewer then the reviewer is a senior reviewer, then it is not the case that the reviewer has a conflict of interest.
If it is not the case that a company uses synthetic methods or uses natural methods, then the company is bankrupt.
Given that it is not the case that if a researcher finds a plant toxic then if the plant is studied the plant is not toxic, then the researcher receives a retraction.
Whenever it is not the case that if a researcher finds a plant toxic then the researcher documents toxicity of the plant, then the researcher commits misconduct.
Provided that it is not the case that if a researcher finds a plant toxic then the researcher documents toxicity of the plant, then it is not the case that the researcher commits misconduct.
If it is not the case that an agency provides a funding grant to a company, then the company develops a drug.
Assuming it is not the case that an agency provides a funding grant to a company, then a plant is toxic.
In the event that it is not the case that an agency provides a funding grant to a company, then a plant is studied.

(A12 → A14).natural: Given that a researcher is a lead researcher, the researcher is respected.

(A13 → (A9 → (A8 → ¬A7))).natural: Should a researcher be a junior researcher, then if the researcher finds a plant toxic, then provided the plant is studied, the plant is not toxic.

(A14 → A11).natural: If a researcher is respected, then the researcher publishes.

(A15 → A4).natural: Whenever a company is synthetic successful, the company uses synthetic methods.

(A16 → A17).natural: In cases where a company is natural successful, a plant is effective.

(A21 → (A12 → A11)).natural: In the event that a reviewer is a senior reviewer, then if a researcher is a lead researcher, the researcher publishes.

(A22 → (A12 → A11)).natural: Provided that a reviewer is a junior reviewer, then if a researcher is a lead researcher, the researcher publishes.

(A23 → A21).natural: If an editor assigns a senior reviewer, then the reviewer is a senior reviewer.

(A23 ∨ A24).natural: An editor assigns a senior reviewer or an editor assigns a junior reviewer.

(A24 → A22).natural: Whenever an editor assigns a junior reviewer, the reviewer is a junior reviewer.

(A26 → (A8 → ¬A7)).natural: Assuming a researcher documents toxicity of a plant, then if the plant is studied, the plant is not toxic.

(A28 → A29).natural: If a researcher receives a retraction, then the researcher is discredited.
